schema_description: This schema is a schema for extracting data from a letter of employment.

schema_definition.title: Employment Letter Name and Salary Extractor
schema_definition.description: This schema is used to extract the name and salary details of an employee from a letter of employment.

employee_name.description: The full name of the employee as stated in the letter of employment. The name should be in title case.

salary.description: The salary details of the employee, including the amount and frequency.

amount.description: The numerical value indicating the salary amount.

frequency.description: The frequency with which the salary is paid. Valid values are 'annually', 'monthly', 'biweekly', 'weekly', or 'hourly'.
